full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Title:**
---------------

* English Title: KN23ST01, Stone Conservator Services
* French Title: KN23ST01, Services de restaurateur de murs de pierre

**Reference Number:**
----------------------

MX-443156562992

**Amendment Number:**
----------------------

3

**Solicitation Number:**
-------------------------

KN23ST01_79812

**Publication Date:**
---------------------

2024-06-13

**Tender Closing Date:**
------------------------

2024-07-25 T14:00:00 (UTC)

**Contracting Entity:**
-------------------------

* Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada (DCC)
* Address: 350 Albert St, 19th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada

**Objective:**
---------------

DCC invites consulting firms to submit abbreviated proposals for the provision of stone conservator services on a "as and when required" basis at CFB Kingston, Ontario. The services include quality inspection of stone at quarry sites and/or cut-shops, assessment of new quarries, and review of tender packages.

**Solicitation Details:**
---------------------------

* The Standing Offer (SO) will be for a period of three (3) years with a maximum estimated value of $400,000.00.
* The SO may be extended for up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods and increased in the order of $250,000.00 at any time.
* Call-ups under the SO are expected to be valued between $50,000.00 and $300,000.00.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
---------------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Trade Agreements:**
-----------------------

This solicitation is being conducted in accordance with the requirements set out in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

**Notice Type:**
------------------

Notice: 46882-KN23ST01

**Procurement Method:**
------------------------

Competitive - Open bidding

**Bidding Documents:**
-------------------------

* The bidding documents are available on the MERX website.
* Fees may apply; refer to the MERX pricing page for more information.

**Contact Information:**
-------------------------

* Ghassane Ouazri
* Email: gh
